publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4759 Donald Gorrie: Castle Tioram—That the Parliament encourages all those involved in advising or making decisions about Castle Tioram, the owner, the local community, the Highland Council, Historic Scotland and the Clanranald Castle Tioram Trust, to meet to discuss together constructively to produce a solution which provides as complete consolidation and repair as possible, as much public access as is reasonable and a nearby interpretation centre, as well as funding for these, and welcomes the initiative to convene such a meeting by the Vice Convener of Highland Council.

S2M-4759 Donald Gorrie: Castle Tioram—That the Parliament encourages all those involved in advising or making decisions about Castle Tioram, the owner, the local community, the Highland Council, Historic Scotland and the Clanranald Castle Tioram Trust, to meet to discuss together constructively to produce a solution which provides as complete consolidation and repair as possible, as much public access as is reasonable and a nearby interpretation centre, as well as funding for these, and welcomes the initiative to convene such a meeting by the Vice Convener of Highland Council.
S2M-4759 Castle Tioram (lodged on 6 September 2006) Murray Tosh*
S2M-4759 Castle Tioram (lodged on 6 September 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Des McNulty*, Carolyn Leckie*, Cathy Peattie*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4759 Castle Tioram (lodged on 6 September 2006) Dave Petrie*
